title: Overcast Includes
subtitle: XML documents which are often included by maps that use PGM

lists.title: Environments
lists.description: Files which configure the overall game play of a particular server

files.title: beta.xml
files.description: Empty -- used by Overcast on the beta testing server

files.title: development.xml
files.description: Empty -- used by Overcast on development realm servers

files.title: global.xml
files.description: Main configuration file for servers -- increases hitbox size and reverts combat to 1.8 stats

files.title: production.xml
files.description: Empty -- used by Overcast for non-development realm servers

files.title: ranked.xml
files.description: Empty -- used by Overcast for ranked realm servers

files.title: tournament.xml
files.description: Used by Overcast for tournament realm servers

files.title: unranked.xml
files.description: Empty -- used by Overcast for non-ranked / non-tournament realm servers

lists.title: Tournaments
lists.description: XMLs includes by past tournament maps

files.title: house-of-cores.xml
files.description: Include file from the House of Cores tournament

files.title: tourney-global.xml
files.description: Standard tournament global include file

lists.title: Server Utilities
lists.description: Useful features for your PGM server

files.title: disable-boat-crafting.xml
files.description: Prevents crafting of all variants of boats

files.title: howto.xml
files.description: Definition for the 'How To' book given to observers

files.title: stamina.xml
files.description: Standardised configuration for the stamina module

files.title: tutorial.xml
files.description: Standardised configuration for the tutorial module

lists.title: Game Types
lists.description: Standardised configuration and setups for various game types

files.title: blitz-global.xml
files.description: Included by most blitz based maps -- forces automatic respawning

files.title: continuity-tnt.xml
files.description: Standardised configuration for TNT based maps -- created by ElectroidFilms

files.title: newstalgia.xml
files.description: Standard kits and settings for the April fools Newstalgia maps

files.title: skywars.xml
files.description: Standard kits and settings for Skywars themed maps

files.title: survival-games.xml
files.description: Standard kits and settings for Survival Games themed maps

files.title: blasternauts.xml
files.description: Standard kits and settings for Blasternauts themed maps

files.title: block-runner.xml
files.description: Standard kits and settings for Block Runner themed maps

files.title: gs-ffa.xml
files.description: Free-for-all setup for Ghost Squadron FFA maps -- still requires gs.xml in order to function correctly

files.title: gs.xml
files.description: Standard kits and setting for Ghost Squadron themed maps

files.title: infection.xml
files.description: Standard kits and settings for Infection themed maps

files.title: king-classes.xml
files.description: Standard kits and settings for King's Conquest themed maps

files.title: king-classes-easter.xml
files.description: Easter themed kits and settings for King's Conquest themed maps

files.title: king-classes-halloween.xml
files.description: Halloween themed kits and settings for King's Conquest themed maps

files.title: mmclasses.xml
files.description: Standard kits and settings for Monster Mash themed maps

files.title: void-death.xml
files.description: Provides quicker deaths by the void

files.title: warwars.xml
files.description: Standard kits and settings for Warwars themed maps
